title: List of College of the Holy Cross alumni
data: United States District Judge for the District of Massachusetts ; nominated by President Dwight D. Eisenhower in 1961
appointed by Governor Edward King in 1981 , served 16 years on the Massachusetts Supreme Judicial Court

section_title: Law , politics , and public service -- United States federal and state court justices
intro: This list of College of the Holy Cross alumni includes graduates and non-graduate, former students at the College of the Holy Cross. Since its founding in 1843, Holy Cross has graduated 157 classes of students and as of the 2005-06 academic year had approximately 35,000 alumni.
